title: Demand Response Event Settlement
description: After a demand response event, a program manager needs to calculate the performance and payments for participating customers.

tasks.description: For each participating customer, establish their baseline consumption for the event hours based on their historical usage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates a customer baseline load for each participant.

tasks.description: Compare the baseline to their actual consumption during the event to determine the load reduction they provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent measures the kW reduction for each participant.

tasks.description: Calculate the payment due to each customer based on their performance and the event's payment rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of payments to be issued.
